reviews.review_msg: She is an excellent professor, but the course is really a mind fck... If you must take this class, take it with her and study the stuff subjectively, never take it personal

SUPER easy course! Definitely take it if you need GPA boosting, the majority of the material is common sense & doesn't require attending lecture or much studying. Her lectures are okay, but she is extremely biased and can't see things from different perspectives. If you don't care about that, definitely take this course.
awesome teacher! very clear notes, well prepared, she's done a lot of research and knows what she's talking about. Class was enjoyable
Interesting course.  She knows her stuff and isn't afraid to share it.
Kim is a fantastic teacher and a leading expert in her field. She is very opinionated, which is sometimes a good thing and sometimes bad...

Took Close Relationships and Individual Differences with her after having her guest lecture one of my PSYC300W lectures. 100% made the right choice. Shes so funny, so real, really connects with her students, super understanding and makes lectures fun! Tests are easy if you study her slides (which have everything on them!). Take her class

I took Close Relationships from her last semester and had a fantastic time! She is a very soft-spoken professor with a great deal of knowledge in her field. She's got a great attitude and explains the subjects very well.
Very interesting class, very helpful and clear in lectures. Tests were a bit hard. Paper was fairly easy if you followed her instructions and recommendations. Overrall great prof!

She wears ONLY matching sweater-sets. Weird. Class is like a girls' club, and the exam is out in left field. Constantly talks about her sister; I think she has some issues to resolve there. Thoroughly know your material. Memorizing text/lecture/slides is not enough. Her powerpoint slides are useless. You can't study from them; they don't cue well.
